meanings.definition: The sound made by a frog
meanings.sent1: I heard a loud ribbit coming from the pond.
meanings.sent2: The ribbit of the frog echoed through the night.
meanings.sent3: The ribbit of the frog made me smile.
meanings.sent4: The ribbit of the frog was like a musical note in the air.
meanings.sent5: The ribbit of the frog was a symphony of nature.

meanings.definition: To make a sound like a frog
meanings.sent1: The children love to ribbit during playtime.
meanings.sent2: She can ribbit better than anyone in the school.
meanings.sent3: When he tried to ribbit, everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter ribbited across the room like a frog's call.
meanings.sent5: The comedian ribbited on stage, mimicking a frog perfectly.
